auth.detail: This application is authentication service that currently be used in money manager applications in other repositories on github.com/mrido10. It is possible that it can be used for other applications by adding some permissions into database

webPorto.detail: This is my portfolio web page. This website provides information about me, education, work experience, skills mastered and being studied, projects that have been made, and contact information. If you want to contact me, you can click on the 'Contact' section.

pathListener.detail: Golang code to auto process files from directory

rijalfawwaz.detail: Web portofolio that contains details about herself, a YouTube list of YouTube channels, provides study classes, and also provides news, There is an admin dashboard to provide content on the website. The techstack using Golang as backend, React js (Vite) and using Tailwind CSS as frontend, Docker as Containerization, PostgreSQL as database to store content, Redis as chace, Nginx as web server, Discord as logging if any error, an youtube api to get data from Youtube channel

payment.detail: Golang service, implement Midtrans to initiate payment

logger.detail: Golang service, to logging like 'log' golang packager. This code can sehow info file like line position, function call, file name call
